name: think-bayes
description: A Think-Bayes library for ES and node.js environment.

scripts.build:index: npx rimraf src/index.js && npx create-index --ignoreUnsafe src
scripts.build:module: npx rimraf lib && npx babel src --copy-files --source-maps --extensions .js --out-dir lib
scripts.build: npm run build:index && npm run build:module
